Name: ∀kashicforce
About the game: ∀kashicforce is a puzzle-game-like, rhythm-game-like game where you input commands to use moves like in a fighting game. The goal is to crush your opponent to a pulp with an immense amount of blocks. In order to put yourself in a better position, kill your opponent's blocks while they are falling down or send Hindrance blocks into their field. Features A unique mix of different game genres 6 playable characters Local split-screen multiplayer English and Japanese language support Preface [Log No.891247:817:38:00] We have confirmed an exponential increase in Anonymous-class Enemies in the 'Kestrel' division. Cause unknown at the moment. The division superintendent is currently dealing with them and investigating the cause. [Log No.891247:817:38:01] The Kestrel division superintendent sent assistance requests to adjacent divisions. Later, additional assistance was confirmed. The situation is anticipated to be fully taken care of and subdued shortly. [Log No.891247:817:38:02] The Kestrel division superintendent proposed the anti-Enemy squad a plan similar to a game. As one of the basic rules, the number of Enemies killed inside of the specified fields defines victory and defeat. Refer to the attached for details. Pending approval.
